global.error: An error occurred. Please try again or contact Support.

files.name: Name
files.confirmOverwrite: Files already exist with the same names as the ones being uploaded. Click OK to overwrite existing files with the same name or Cancel to proceed without overwriting.
files.noFileSelected: No files selected. Please select a file.
files.cannotCreateFolder: Sorry! Folders cannot be created in this directory.
files.searchFail: The search request was not successful.
files.cannotUploadFiles: Files cannot be saved to this folder. Please choose again.
files.confirmCopyFolder: Are you sure to copy the folder '{folderName}'?
files.confirmCopy: You have selected {folderNum} folders and {fileNum} files. Are you sure to copy them?
files.forbidCopyRootFolder: Copying all data at once is not allowed.
files.exceedMaxSize: This file cannot be selected because it exceeds the max allowed size of {maxSize} bytes.
files.multiselectExceedMaxSize: Some files were ignored because they exceed the max allowed size of {maxSize} bytes.

accounts.confirmRemove: You will no longer be able to browse this account. Are you sure you would like to remove it? (Note that this does not log you out of the account on this browser)
accounts.chooseAccount: Welcome! Please choose a service to connect

dropzone.message: Drag and drop files here, or click to open the File Picker

computer.noSupport: Your browser doesn't have Flash, Silverlight or HTML5 support.
computer.confirmClose: Are you sure you want to close this tab? You have an upload in progress.
computer.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel? You have an upload in progress.
computer.disconnect: Uploading has been paused due to disconnection.
computer.error: Uploading has been paused due to errors when uploading the file '{file}'. Resume to retry.
computer.uploadFail: Failed to upload the file '{file}'. Please try again or contact Support.
computer.pleaseUploadFilesOfTypes: Please upload files of the following types: {types}.
computer.exceedMaxSize: '{file}' cannot be uploaded because it exceeds the max allowed size of {maxSize} bytes.

addConfirm.clickBelow: Click below to connect your {serviceName} account
